controller

Class EditorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.TopControl
      • controller.EditorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class EditorController
extends TopControl
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    FXML Controller class used to define and create patterns and their .rle files. Saves .rle files into the predetermined format. And also showcases the next 20 iterations of a pattern on the bottom canvas. The editor also can send the pattern to the gif controller for .gif creation
    See Also:
    SaveGifController

      • setCustomRule

        protected void setCustomRule()
        Description copied from class: TopControl
        Used in order to set a custom rule set. The method parses a given rule and sets the given rule set to the current board.
